description: These reports summarise the work we have done to improve London's transport network

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Our Annual Report summarises our achievements over the last financial year and the work we have done to improve your transport network."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

The draft 2018/19 Annual Report and statement of accounts, together with the Annual Governance Statement for that year, are available under the 10 June 2019 meeting on the Audit & Assurance committee page .
Find out about your rights to inspect these documents in the Notice of public rights .

{"template":"carousel","link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"carousel":[{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/april-2017.jpg","alt":"New 'Please offer me a seat' badges help customers with invisible conditions"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/may-2017.jpg","alt":"The new Samsung Pay app can be used for 'pay as you go' travel on our network"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/june-2017.jpg","alt":"New trains that will serve the Elizabeth line run from Liverpool Street to Shenfield"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/july-2017.jpg","alt":"A £42m fund will help taxi drivers replace the most polluting diesel cabs"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/august-2017.jpg","alt":"Figures show the Night Tube boosted London's economy by £171m in its first year"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/september-2017.jpg","alt":"Collecting anonymised WiFi connection data can help us improve the Tube"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/october-2017.jpg","alt":"The T-Charge sets a tough emissions standard for older, more polluting vehicles"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/november-2017.jpg","alt":"The second Oxford Street consultation outlines plans for the historic shopping avenue"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/december-2017.jpg","alt":"London Overground's first 24-hour services start running at weekends"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/january-2018.jpg","alt":"Hopper fare expands -  unlimited bus and tram journeys in an hour cost customers £1.50"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/february-2018.jpg","alt":"Santander Cycles is extended to Brixton, with seven docking stations and 200 bikes"},{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/march-2018.jpg","alt":"Bromley-by-Bow becomes the 73rd Tube station with step-free access"}],"wrapped":false}
